Name: The End of Dyeus
About the game: Through a blue shining light, you awaken in the center of a circle of menhirs. You don't remember anything, except that you must find 'Dyeus'... Go in a search for it in a primitive and cryptic open world. Fight against the Shadows and the Guardians, two factions in a war, along with a carnivorous fauna and redoubtable bosses, and explore a hostile world with a nebulous past... An adventure full of challenges awaits! A true open world adventure Explore a fully open world with diverse biomes and discover devastated locations and hidden secrets. No barrier to stop you! Features a day and night cycle, and a weather system. Nervous and challenging fights Religious fanatics with primitive weapons, powerful warriors with plasma cannons, as well as a wild and carnivorous fauna. Fight against more than 50 fast and deadly enemies, each requiring a different strategy... or let them kill each others in a deep infighting system! Continual player progression Find a wide range of different weapons, from a simple old bone to heavy plasma weaponry, along with various swords, spears and bows, and search for health upgrades or buy armors in shops to improve yourself. A pure gameplay experience Like good old times, no cutscenes or long narrative sequence. Play right from the start and find more than 40 hidden books to uncover the story of this world facing war and desolation. A retro eletro-tribal soundtrack Listen to upbeat, primitive and wild tunes inspired by 90s computer games !
